level.heading: Enrollment of Council acts and resolutions; filing with Archives.
level.text: After enactment by the Council, but before any presentation to the Mayor, each act and resolution of the Council shall be set forth on parchment or other such suitable paper.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-19, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-601.

Law 8-235 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-559, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 1990, and December 18, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-318 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
